summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PlatanSad plant store - mobile responsive design and LiqPay integration working well
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 20/20 tests passed)
Products CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
LiqPay payment integration (checkout creation, status check)
Mobile catalog page displays products correctly (390px width)
Add to cart button works and shows confirmation ('Додано' text)
Cart counter updates in header (shows correct count)
Checkout page loads with modern UI and proper mobile layout
LiqPay payment option is visible and selectable with TEST mode indicator
Checkout form validation works (name, phone, email fields)
Mobile responsive design (390px width, touch-friendly buttons 52px height)
Product images and details display correctly
Price display with Ukrainian hryvnia (₴) currency
